name: Juwai
tag_list: real-estate, international, property, china, advertising, classifieds
overview:
Juwai is where Chinese find international property.

Juwai means “home overseas” and Juwai.com is visited each day by thousands of Chinese potential property buyers. 82% of its traffic comes from over 315 cities throughout China, and 18% from major Chinese communities in Taiwan, Hong Kong, Malaysia and Singapore.

This privately funded company is responsible for innovations such as:

–The first global platform to engage Chinese buyers in 2011. –The first international mapping of property in Mandarin. –The largest bank of international real estate data and information in Chinese. –The first e-commerce platform for online real estate advertising in any language.

The site is the largest source for global property in Chinese, with over 1.6 million property listings spanning 54 countries, with over 3,000 current news stories, country buying guides, education and emigration articles, and an active and fast growing Chinese social media community.
